item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, March 13, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Cursor told me I should learn coding instead of asking it to generate code (15 points | 3 comments)
2. Something Is Rotten in the State of Cupertino (26 points | 19 comments)

8. Almquist shell (ash) variants (6 points | no comments)
9. A Perplexing Javascript Parsing Puzzle (22 points | 6 comments)
10. Upgrading Semgrep from OCaml 4 to OCaml 5 (21 points | 2 comments)
11. On The Insecurity of Telecom Stacks in the Wake of Salt Typhoon (46 points | 13 comments)

13. We should improve libzfs somewhat (3 points | 2 comments)
14. The DuckDB Local UI (27 points | 2 comments)
15. rmk: Rust keyboard firmware library with layers, macros, real-time keymap editing, wireless(BLE) and split support (37 points | 5 comments)
16. Xit devlog - optional patches, force push, symlinks (3 points | no comments)
17. Traversal-resistant file APIs (16 points | 2 comments)

21. Smoke test your Django admin site (1 points | no comments)
22. Guile Hoot with Fibers (9 points | 2 comments)
23. Perspectives from the Technical University of Munich (26 points | 11 comments)
24. Why I stopped everything and started writing C again (6 points | 6 comments)
25. Here’s how I use LLMs to help me write code (66 points | 24 comments)
